website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for women and middle school age children, since it's slightly smaller.
pros: Also good for younger players, since it's smaller than a men's ball
cons: Ball can be damaged by leaving it in the water for long periods, so be sure to take it out when you're done

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for games
customer_reviews.text: I play high school water polo, and this ball is perfect. It has enough air, and it looks and feels like a professional game ball. I recommend this for any girl that plays because it's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just as I expected! My son plays water polo, but I help him practice treading & throwing. The guys ball is difficult for me to handle, so this one is easier for me to play around with & help my son in the water. We also love tossing this around to each other when we're at the lake. Lots of fun & great work out!
customer_reviews.author: Forever Learning

customer_reviews.title: Very nice water polo ball
customer_reviews.text: Very nice water polo ball. The grippy finish is consistent and easy to hold, and the ball holds air just as you'd expect. This is the perfect size for a younger player to use to learn ball control and game basics, before aging up to the full size ball.
customer_reviews.author: Flensr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 12U-14U Water Polo
customer_reviews.text: Just what my 14U son needed for water polo practice at home. It's been left in the water and left outside in the sun and it is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays water polo for her school. Since schools are all closed right now I got her a ball so she can practice at home. It's a very good quality ball. She really loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Cederlof

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy or pro ball, you don't need water to have fun with it
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great brand, easy to grip. I have given them to all my grandchildren as yard balls and sidewalk balls, but they also work fine in pools and lakes. You can even use them for floats it you are under about 70 lbs. Overall a lifetime investment, I have used an older version for 35 years now, it is still find, holds air.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Mikasa has great quality water polo balls. If you are looking for a water polo ball with good grip when it's wet, look no further. This is a great ball.
customer_reviews.author: Leap Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent ball grip is solid feels good in hand. Just air it up and it’s ready to toss around in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jeane

customer_reviews.title: Best ball out there!! Water polo Life!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars only because I haven't filled entirely with air and got it wet yet. But so car so good and super happy to have a ball again. I was very happy to receive this item
customer_reviews.author: Earth Junglist

customer_reviews.title: Good for high school
customer_reviews.text: Balls the right size for girls high school water polo. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: great water polo ball
customer_reviews.text: daughter is in water polo and loves this. uses it all the time for practice.
customer_reviews.author: c c

customer_reviews.title: Great ball and value
customer_reviews.text: It's a great ball and between my daughter that played water polo this summer and the rest of the family, It's been great. Being the woman's size is perfect for the younger kids because they can throw it fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Gkami

customer_reviews.title: Ball had a tiny hole, doesn't stay inflated.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball for my daughter's birthday. Unfortunately, her birthday was right at the time everything shut down due to COVID-19. Waterpolo practices, pools etc. shut down and we didn't realize the ball wasn't staying inflated until over 4 weeks of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deflates too easily
customer_reviews.text: The grip is really good! But it deflates really easily. When I took it out of the package, it was dented and didn't have much air. And then after I pumped air into it, it was deflated again the next morning. The ball I got may have a hole in it somewhere, because when I played water polo in high school, exact same brand but they were always fine during practice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexine Adonis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have a fresh ball with great grip.
customer_reviews.author: HeathrMayO

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Review!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a waterloo ball with a good grip and this one had a very good grip and was very good quality. The shipping was very fast and came in excellent condition, I was very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: Hole in Ball
customer_reviews.text: Sadly we just pumped this up for the first time and it has a hole. Too late to return now. 100% Waste of money. If you do buy from here be sure to test for hole when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: A good ball for the  pool
customer_reviews.text: It work fine for me in the pool. A good size.
customer_reviews.author: Lavonne Gunn

customer_reviews.title: As expected, new and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Only surprising thing was that it came already inflated. Everything else was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: PeanutbutterJelly

customer_reviews.title: Not as Gripp-y as Imagined
customer_reviews.text: The ball came, but the grooves are not as deep as I imagined. I also think it's not filled up all the way with air, which is a good thing. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beata Suchodolska-Klis

customer_reviews.title: ball keeps deflating
customer_reviews.text: The ball deflates after a few days. Received a defective item
customer_reviews.author: Adel Zin

customer_reviews.title: Great water polo ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball has a great grip to it and it’s a little smaller than regulation which makes it much easier to handle
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Ball has slow leak. Only stays inflated for about ...
customer_reviews.text: Ball has slow leak. Only stays inflated for about 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product, not that happy with the reputation of the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girls are playing water polo and this helps them practice hand control while around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: It has an excellent grip and feel, it is not cheap. I am sure it will last, but I cannot be sure. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: W M

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a top quality item. Love Amazon - so easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a top quality item for a fair price. Now if my kid would not lose it, that would be great!
customer_reviews.author: CampingKing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered! Great quality and good price! We are new to waterpolo. My son joined the intermediate Waterpolo team at school. This is his first year and he wanted to have his own ball. We don't know a lot about the different companies who supply waterpolo equipment. Found this ball very easily on Amazon. Confirmed with my son's coaches re. the size we needed before ordering it here. Although it's a women's ball (smaller than standard), it is the exact size my son uses at practice.
customer_reviews.author: Chang One

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great price! And the ball is great. Love the grip. Daughters first waterpolo ball, so we’re happy
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I got a dry ball. It had a hole ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a dry ball . It had a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Bendov

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but it has low grip. But still a good ball.
customer_reviews.author: kyong pak

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ball for practice at home or in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Jason Warner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was very happy to get her first water polo ball. They even blew it up.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: I you love water polo
customer_reviews.text: From the box into the pool. I you love water polo, then this is the buy for you
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: great quality, feel and grip
customer_reviews.text: Everything we expected, great quality, feel and grip. Daughter using her ball everyday to practice
customer_reviews.author: Mario Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: IT's a water polo ball. There's a word limit so I'm going to keep typing but basically its just what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Quality ball.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball for my daughter who participates in high school water polo. Great quality with a great price, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ABBA716

product_meta.title: W5009 - Mikasa Sports Competition Women's Water Polo Ball
product_meta.description: Score a goal with the Water Polo Ball by Mikala Sports - Size 4, Yellow - Varsity Series. This sports accessory is made sturdy with hand buffed rubber that can withstand all outdoor conditions. Additionally, it has ridges on it for superior, non-slip grip and lets the player hold it with only one hand. What's more, this game ball is officially approved by the USA Water Polo Organization and National Federation of State High School Associations (NFHS). So, what are you waiting for? Complete your equipment with the Water Polo Ball by Mikala Sports - Size 4, Yellow - Varsity Series today!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
